review: The image quality is below standard. The advertisement spells the resolution to be 1080p; however I find it to be 640 by 480p. It's even below 720p. The picture is fuzzy, the deepness of color is missing, Besides the picture quality, the unit works fine, I will only buy the unit if Amazon improves the picture quality to true 1920 by 1080p. This why I am giving it three stars.
